no.
i was the one who had guarded my feet from her swipe, at the expense of my arm.

name: bohgan
normalized: gaah!
i roared like a wild beast and smashed my entire body onto kila’s.

name: kila
normalized: this guy!?
kila lost her poise and fell to her knees.
even then, she was about to throw her knife at me, in an attempt to impede my escape.

name: bohgan
normalized: guaah!
i scooped up the wound in my right arm with my left palm, and swiped my blood over kila.

name: kila
normalized: kuuh!?
you bastard!

name: beatrice
normalized: he is making his escape!
a gunshot echoed.

name: bohgan
normalized: aguuh!
my shoulder was pierced by that shot.
was it beatrice or kila who had shot me?
however, it didn’t really matter anymore.
this was the best that i could have possibly done.

name: bohgan
normalized: i will be sure to have my vengeance!
i proclaimed it loudly and jumped off from the deck, into the sand sea below,
abandoning my right arm behind.

name: bohgan
normalized: guaah!
my entire body hit the waves of the sand sea.
it was a considerable height from the deck.
that shocking impact compounded my already serious injury.
it was a miracle that i hadn’t fainted instantly.

name: bohgan
normalized: guguh… uuh… guuh…

name: bohgan
normalized: (i… donny bohgan… am dying!

name: bohgan
normalized: (not in this place… not before… not before getting my… vengeance…)

name: bohgan
normalized: (death… is closing in…)
as my desperate consciousness faded, i sank…
deeper and deeper.
beyond the point of no return.
however, just as my consciousness was on the verge of sinking into the darkness,
i felt someone grab my still-intact left arm.
